content: cid 1  it was back in march it should technically be spring already yet it was still way too cold outside if you live in the midwest namely illinois you know what i m talking about way too cold way too long winter it should be spring now didn t they get the memo i just wanted something fun and whimsical as a temporary relief from the still-cold weather waves twists and turns something girly and something pretty the ribbing which carries all the way down the heel flap for added interest makes the fit pretty snug the pattern includes optional charts* for a mirrored pair or if you re making a pair at once you can certainly stick to the primary charts to prevent confusion either way these socks are sure to please the inner girliness in everyone *optional mirrored cuff and main charts can be found on page 6 cid 1  1 p o l l y j e a n materials needed cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 cid 1 key 4 oz of fingering weight yarn no stitch sample used is j-knits superwash no stitch on foot me in virginia knit right side purl wrong side us 1 5 2 5mm needle -
